author: 1999thomasb
title: Basic...
review: I think this is a great set. This visorak is basically simple to make, and it has a cool spinner. It is a lot like the other visorak. But, it was hard to use the spinner sometimes. After some practice I got the hang of it, though. I have two visorak. And I give this one a 5 out of 5. It is my favourite.

author: smiley905
title: this is a good bionicle
review: i realy like the head, but it and the body should be seprate peices. the legs are cool and would be good peices for moc bionicles. the spinner is impsoble to aim and is the reason i gave it a 4. this set rocks and the pincers are good but somtimes dont work to well

author: Gus_263
title: Visorak in ta-metru
review: This is the red visorak, with another cool colors. Like the orange pieces and the dark green eyes. The red pieces and green eyes are characteristics of ta-metru's sets. The legs are different to the small arms. It also launchs the rhotuka spinners. Like all visorak, and is also a option for creations.

author: DarthVader_
title: Cool Bionicle
review: This was my first Bionicle of many!  I really like it!  The Rhotuka Spinner Launcher is awesome!  I do not like how the head wobbles.  Besides that, I really like the set and I am glad they make cool, and better ones!

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Visorak) - Visorak Vohrarak Review
review:
This is a fun set to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has 32 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has a lot of great and useful pieces which are always great to have for future MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms for sure. I like the design which LEGO has chosen for the big head and the claw pieces as well.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers as well.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8742-1.jpg[/img]


The legs and the feet are adjustable. You're also able to push the head down a little bit if you want to move the gray claws. On the back is a launcher which you can use to shoot the spinner.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
